title: What are the issues in the South Africa race row? Your questions answered...
text:
South Africa are one victory against Canada away from confirming their place in the quarter-finals at the World Cup, but off the field there have been two significant distractions.

Q What are the distractions affecting the Springboks?

Lock Eben Etzebeth was accused of assaulting and racially abusing a group of four men in Langebaan, near Cape Town, and is now the subject of an inquiry by the South African Rugby Union and the South African Human Rights Commission.

Then there was outrage on social media following last week’s victory over Italy, after a clip that was widely interpreted...
